DOC.brief_summary: Prospective, non-randomized, open Pharmacokinetic-Pharmacogenetic-Pharmacodynamic monocentric study. Donor and recipient CYP3A5 genotype and recipient ABCB1 will not be communicate to clinicians or patients during the study.
DOC.brief_title: Immunosuppressive Therapy Optimization: Development of a Population Pharmacokinetic-pharmacodynamic (PK-PD) Model in Liver Transplantation
DOC.criteria: Adults over 18 Liver transplant recipients Treated with an immunosuppressive protocol with tacrolimus Informed on the study and who did not refuse to participate Patients who participate in a study with procedures incompatible with the present study. Patients with legal protection/deprived of liberty.
